name: StickMan Sniper TTK
description: StickMan Sniper TTK is 2d Sniper Game Made For Enjoyment. It Have Very User Friendly Interface. It's a Very Light Game. You Need To Shoot The list of targets that need to be taken down quickly. Just another day at the office, right? Grab your gun and get to work in this exciting shooter game. You can upgrade to cooler and more powerful weapons between jobs. We Will Launch a 3D Version Of This Game In future. On Starting It May Take SomeTime
